items.title: The L.A. protests over immigration raids could actually help Trump pass his megabill. Here’s how.
items.description: Polls show more support for the president’s immigration policy than his policies on the economy or inflation.

items.title: Summer doldrums are slowing stock trading — but don’t sell a dull market short

items.title: My daughter will be on Medicaid for life. Can my wife and I invest in the stock market?
items.description: Consider a special-needs trust, in addition to other safeguards.
